channel.title: Witch Doctor [Neutral Social]
channel.description: **Voodoo(Day)** - Curse a word of at least 4 letters, the first person to speak that work after you use this ability will be silenced for the rest of the day - Infinite Uses **Hoodoo(Night)** - Curse a player, anyone who visits that player will not be able to accuse anyone of treason tomorrow - Infinite Uses **Things I ain't even tried(Night)** - Curse a player, if voted up to the stand, all pardon votes will become execute votes - 2 Uses **Friends on the other side(Passive)** - Can hear the dead talking, but cannot respond *Objective: See the Blue Dragon fall*

item.title: Witch Doctor [Neutral Social]

item.title: Witch Doctor [Neutral Social]
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
I really like this one but I’d give her some form of temporary night immunity ability or passive as as fun as she is to play her win rate would be atrociously low.

item.title: Witch Doctor [Neutral Social]
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Voodoo(Day) - Curse a word of at least 4 letters, the first person to speak that work after you use this ability will be silenced for the rest of the day - Infinite Uses
Hoodoo(Night) - Curse a player, anyone who visits that player will not be able to accuse anyone of treason tomorrow - Infinite Uses
Things I ain’t even tried(Night) - Curse a player, if voted up to the stand, all pardon votes will become execute votes - 2 Uses
Friends on the other side(Passive) - Can hear the dead talking, but cannot respond
Objective: See the Blue Dragon fall

Read full topic
